text.div:
ResourceVersionPolicy

How the system supports versioning for a resource.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/versioning-policy defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
no-version No VersionId SupportVersionId meta-property is not supported (server) or used (client).
versioned VersionedVersionId meta-property is supported (server) or used (client).
versioned-update VersionId tracked fullyVersionId must be correct for updates (server) or will be specified (If-match header) for updates (client).

name: ResourceVersionPolicy
description: How the system supports versioning for a resource.

concept.definition: VersionId meta-property is not supported (server) or used (client).
VersionId meta-property is supported (server) or used (client).
VersionId must be correct for updates (server) or will be specified (If-match header) for updates (client).
